howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.keywordsHint: Keywords don't need to be exact‚Äîe.g. "Offspring" or "The Offspring" work similarly. They become part of the search prompt.
howItWorks.step2: A profile will be generated and attached to your account.
howItWorks.step3: Try generating a newsletter. The system will do some crawling, work its magic, and do its best. See if the events it finds fit you.
howItWorks.step4: If some events don't fit, use "Dislike this" on newsletters to exclude artists, venues, organizers, or specific events. Future newsletters won't include them.
howItWorks.step5: If they do, great! You're all set and you'll get a new newsletter every Thu around 4 PM.
howItWorks.step6: If they still don't fit, try fiddling with the preferences? Remember though: This is THE TOOL to get you all the events. This is just meant to make your event finding experience a little better.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.serviceContent: The Event Newsletter is a personalized weekly event discovery service provided by Good Software. By using this service, you agree to these terms.
terms.acceptanceContent: By creating an account and using our service, you accept these terms. We may update these terms from time to time; continued use after changes constitutes acceptance.
terms.contactContent: For questions about these terms or the service, please contact Good Software.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.dataWeCollectContent: We collect your email address and name when you register. This information is used solely to provide you with the service (e.g. sending newsletters) and to identify your account.
privacy.howWeUseDataContent: Your email and name are not used or shared with any third party. We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal data.
privacy.preferencesContent: Your preferences (interests, city, event sources, etc.) are used to create a profile that helps personalize your newsletter. This profile is shared with Perplexity (our AI provider) to discover and recommend events‚Äîbut it is not linked to your email address or other identifying information.
privacy.noSharingContent: You pay for the service. We have no need to mess with your data in any way, and we will not do so. Our business model is straightforward: transparent, direct payment for a useful service.
privacy.paymentContent: This will be a paid service when it launches. The yearly payment is transparent and direct‚Äîyou pay for the service, and that is it.
privacy.contactContent: For privacy-related questions or to exercise your rights (access, deletion, etc.), contact us at support@event-newsletter.com.
